name: DDR3310 (Death Death Revolution)
description:
DDR3310 (Death Death Revolution) Have you ever been so good at dancing that you literally died?
me neither!

This game is a submission for the nokia3310 gamejam 2.

Dance your way to death in this DDR style rythm game.

Controls

w/z = first column
x = second column
c = third column


left arrow = left arrow
up arrow = up arrow
right arrow = right arrow

People who worked on this
  • Sven (Svon): Programmer
  • Daan van Luijk aka Combokarel:  Music
  • Boris aka Boris: Fantastic art (F-Art)
